fields.Notes:
"You guys are doing a great job, and I believe in your mission. I'm trying to get my mom and dad to help me promote, archive and document their languages. 

I hope people get to hear my mom's mothertongue, Shekhawati, which is a Rajasthani language, and find it pleasant and/or interesting! ".

My parents' apartment in Columbia, SC (my mom is the interviewee)
fields.Transcription: I've added the transcript as part of the closed captions.
fields.Translation: I've added the English translation as part of the closed captions (in parentheses).
YouTube License Statement: This video is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International license. To download a copy, please contact hello@wikitongues.org.
fields.Geneaology: "[ Indo-European, Indo-Iranian, Indo-Aryan, Central zone, Rajasthani, Marwari ]"

fields.Notes:
